text:
I’m feeling very #Thankful that my name came up on a #COVID19 #Vaccine #waitlist at my local #pharmacy last night, & today I was #Vaccinated! 

If you live in #BC & you’re eligible, sign up on the #BCGovt website https://t.co/jIU0MUaQw5 to get an appointment! I knew it was... 1/ https://t.co/uTq2GTvcoQ
